domain.description: Domain used to connect to the ZITADEL instance

jwt_profile_file.description: Path to the file containing credentials to connect to ZITADEL. Either 'jwt_profile_file' or 'jwt_profile_json' is required

jwt_profile_json.description: JSON value of credentials to connect to ZITADEL. Either 'jwt_profile_file' or 'jwt_profile_json' is required

port.description: Used port if not the default ports 80 or 443 are configured

token.description: Path to the file containing credentials to connect to ZITADEL

allowed_to_fail.description: when true, the next action will be called even if this action fails

timeout.description: after which time the action will be terminated if not finished

block.description: Resource representing an action belonging to an organization.

auth_method_type.description: Auth method type, supported values: API_AUTH_METHOD_TYPE_BASIC, API_AUTH_METHOD_TYPE_PRIVATE_KEY_JWT

client_id.description: generated ID for this config

client_secret.description: generated secret for this config

block.description: Resource representing an API application belonging to a project, with all configuration possibilities.

expiration_date.description: Expiration date of the app key in the RFC3339 format

key_type.description: Type of the app key, supported values: KEY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED, KEY_TYPE_JSON

block.description: Resource representing a app key

access_token_type.description: Access token type, supported values: OIDC_TOKEN_TYPE_BEARER, OIDC_TOKEN_TYPE_JWT

app_type.description: App type, supported values: OIDC_APP_TYPE_WEB, OIDC_APP_TYPE_USER_AGENT, OIDC_APP_TYPE_NATIVE

auth_method_type.description: Auth method type, supported values: OIDC_AUTH_METHOD_TYPE_BASIC, OIDC_AUTH_METHOD_TYPE_POST, OIDC_AUTH_METHOD_TYPE_NONE, OIDC_AUTH_METHOD_TYPE_PRIVATE_KEY_JWT

client_id.description: generated ID for this config

client_secret.description: generated secret for this config

grant_types.description: Grant types, supported values: OIDC_GRANT_TYPE_AUTHORIZATION_CODE, OIDC_GRANT_TYPE_IMPLICIT, OIDC_GRANT_TYPE_REFRESH_TOKEN, OIDC_GRANT_TYPE_DEVICE_CODE, OIDC_GRANT_TYPE_TOKEN_EXCHANGE

response_types.description: Response type, supported values: OIDC_RESPONSE_TYPE_CODE, OIDC_RESPONSE_TYPE_ID_TOKEN, OIDC_RESPONSE_TYPE_ID_TOKEN_TOKEN

skip_native_app_success_page.description: Skip the successful login page on native apps and directly redirect the user to the callback.

block.description: Resource representing an OIDC application belonging to a project, with all configuration possibilities.
Resource representing a SAML application belonging to a project, with all configuration possibilities.
Resource representing the default domain policy.

background_color_dark.description: hex value for background color dark theme

font_color_dark.description: hex value for font color dark theme

hide_login_name_suffix.description: hides the org suffix on the login form if the scope "urn:zitadel:iam:org:domain:primary:{domainname}" is set. Details about this scope in https://zitadel.ch/docs/concepts#Reserved_Scopes

primary_color_dark.description: hex value for primary color dark theme

set_active.description: set the label policy active after creating/updating

theme_mode.description: theme mode, supported values: THEME_MODE_UNSPECIFIED, THEME_MODE_AUTO, THEME_MODE_DARK, THEME_MODE_LIGHT

warn_color_dark.description: hex value for warn color dark theme

block.description: Resource representing the default label policy.

max_password_attempts.description: Maximum password check attempts before the account gets locked. Attempts are reset as soon as the password is entered correctly or the password is reset.

block.description: Resource representing the default lockout policy.

allow_domain_discovery.description: if set to true, the suffix (@domain.com) of an unknown username input on the login screen will be matched against the org domains and will redirect to the registration of that organisation on success.

allow_external_idp.description: defines if a user is allowed to add a defined identity provider. E.g. Google auth

allow_register.description: defines if a person is allowed to register a user on this organisation

default_redirect_uri.description: defines where the user will be redirected to if the login is started without app context (e.g. from mail)

disable_login_with_email.description: defines if user can additionally (to the loginname) be identified by their verified email address

disable_login_with_phone.description: defines if user can additionally (to the loginname) be identified by their verified phone number

force_mfa.description: defines if a user MUST use a multi factor to log in

force_mfa_local_only.description: if activated, ZITADEL only enforces MFA on local authentications. On authentications through MFA, ZITADEL won't prompt for MFA.

hide_password_reset.description: defines if password reset link should be shown in the login screen

idps.description: allowed idps to login or register

ignore_unknown_usernames.description: defines if unknown username on login screen directly return an error or always display the password screen

passwordless_type.description: defines if passwordless is allowed for users

user_login.description: defines if a user is allowed to login with his username and password

block.description: Resource representing the default login policy.

auto_redirect_description.description: Text to describe that auto-redirect should happen after successful login

redirected_description.description: Text to describe that the window can be closed after redirect

password_change.description: Send notification if a user changes his password

block.description: Resource representing the default notification policy.

refresh_token_idle_expiration.description: expiration duration of idle refresh tokens

block.description: Resource representing the default oidc settings.

has_lowercase.description: defines if the password MUST contain a lower case letter

has_number.description: defines if the password MUST contain a number

has_symbol.description: defines if the password MUST contain a symbol. E.g. "$"

has_uppercase.description: defines if the password MUST contain an upper case letter

block.description: Resource representing the default password complexity policy.
Resource representing the default privacy policy.
Resource representing a domain of the organization.
Resource representing the custom domain policy of an organization.

gender.description: Gender of the user, supported values: GENDER_UNSPECIFIED, GENDER_FEMALE, GENDER_MALE, GENDER_DIVERSE

initial_password.description: Initially set password for the user, not changeable after creation

is_email_verified.description: Is the email verified of the user, can only be true if password of the user is set

is_phone_verified.description: Is the phone verified of the user

block.description: Resource representing a human user situated under an organization, which then can be authorized through memberships or direct grants on other resources.

auto_linking.description: Enable if users should get prompted to link an existing ZITADEL user to an external account if the selected attribute matches, supported values: AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED, AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_USERNAME, AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_EMAIL

client_id.description: client id generated by the identity provider

client_secret.description: client secret generated by the identity provider

is_auto_creation.description: enable if a new account in ZITADEL should be created automatically on login with an external account

is_auto_update.description: enable if a the ZITADEL account fields should be updated automatically on each login

is_creation_allowed.description: enable if users should be able to create a new account in ZITADEL when using an external account

is_linking_allowed.description: enable if users should be able to link an existing ZITADEL user with an external account

scopes.description: the scopes requested by ZITADEL during the request on the identity provider

tenant_id.description: if tenant_id is not set, the tenant_type is used

roles.description: List of roles granted, full list available here: https://zitadel.com/docs/guides/manage/console/managers#roles

key_type.description: Type of the machine key, supported values: KEY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED, KEY_TYPE_JSON

public_key.description: Optionally provide a public key of your own generated RSA private key

block.description: Resource representing a machine key

access_token_type.description: Access token type, supported values: ACCESS_TOKEN_TYPE_BEARER, ACCESS_TOKEN_TYPE_JWT

client_id.description: Value of the client ID if withSecret is true

with_secret.description: Generate machine secret, only applicable if creation or change from false

password_change.description: Send notification if a user changes his password

is_default.description: True sets the org as default org for the instance. Only one org can be default org. Nothing happens if you set it to false until you set another org as default org.

auto_linking.description: Enable if users should get prompted to link an existing ZITADEL user to an external account if the selected attribute matches, supported values: AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED, AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_USERNAME, AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_EMAIL

client_id.description: client id generated by the identity provider

client_secret.description: client secret generated by the identity provider

is_auto_creation.description: enable if a new account in ZITADEL should be created automatically on login with an external account

is_auto_update.description: enable if a the ZITADEL account fields should be updated automatically on each login

is_creation_allowed.description: enable if users should be able to create a new account in ZITADEL when using an external account

is_id_token_mapping.description: if true, provider information get mapped from the id token, not from the userinfo endpoint

is_linking_allowed.description: enable if users should be able to link an existing ZITADEL user with an external account

scopes.description: the scopes requested by ZITADEL during the request on the identity provider

block.description: Resource representing a generic OIDC IdP on the organization.

auto_linking.description: Enable if users should get prompted to link an existing ZITADEL user to an external account if the selected attribute matches, supported values: AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_UNSPECIFIED, AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_USERNAME, AUTO_LINKING_OPTION_EMAIL

binding.description: The binding, supported values: SAML_BINDING_UNSPECIFIED, SAML_BINDING_POST, SAML_BINDING_REDIRECT, SAML_BINDING_ARTIFACT

is_auto_creation.description: enable if a new account in ZITADEL should be created automatically on login with an external account

is_auto_update.description: enable if a the ZITADEL account fields should be updated automatically on each login

is_creation_allowed.description: enable if users should be able to create a new account in ZITADEL when using an external account

is_linking_allowed.description: enable if users should be able to link an existing ZITADEL user with an external account

metadata_xml.description: The metadata XML as plain string

with_signed_request.description: Whether the SAML IDP requires signed requests

block.description: Resource representing a SAML IdP on the organization.
Resource representing the membership of a user on an organization, defined with the given role.

key.description: The key of a metadata entry

value.description: The string representation of a metadata entry value. For binary data, use the base64encode function.

block.description: Add a custom attribute to the organization like its location or an identifier in another system. You can use this information in your actions. This Terraform resource manages a single key-value pair.

has_lowercase.description: defines if the password MUST contain a lower case letter

has_number.description: defines if the password MUST contain a number

has_symbol.description: defines if the password MUST contain a symbol. E.g. "$"

has_uppercase.description: defines if the password MUST contain an upper case letter

block.description: Resource representing the custom password complexity policy of an organization.

expiration_date.description: Expiration date of the token in the RFC3339 format

block.description: Resource representing a personal access token of a user
Resource representing the custom privacy policy of an organization.

has_project_check.description: ZITADEL checks if the org of the user has permission to this project

private_labeling_setting.description: Defines from where the private labeling should be triggered, supported values: PRIVATE_LABELING_SETTING_UNSPECIFIED, PRIVATE_LABELING_SETTING_ENFORCE_PROJECT_RESOURCE_OWNER_POLICY, PRIVATE_LABELING_SETTING_ALLOW_LOGIN_USER_RESOURCE_OWNER_POLICY

project_role_assertion.description: describes if roles of user should be added in token

project_role_check.description: ZITADEL checks if the user has at least one on this project

block.description: Resource representing the project, which can then be granted to different organizations or users directly, containing different applications.

granted_org_id.description: ID of the organization granted the project

block.description: Resource representing the grant of a project to a different organization, also containing the available roles which can be given to the members of the projectgrant.
Resource representing the membership of a user on an granted project, defined with the given role.
Resource representing the membership of a user on an project, defined with the given role.
Resource representing the project roles, which can be given as authorizations to users.

sender_number.description: Sender number which is used to send the SMS.

sid.description: SID used to communicate with Twilio.

token.description: Token used to communicate with Twilio.

block.description: Resource representing the SMS provider Twilio configuration of an instance.

host.description: Host and port address to your SMTP server.

password.description: Password used to communicate with your SMTP server.

sender_name.description: Sender name used to send emails.

set_active.description: Set the SMTP configuration active after creating/updating

tls.description: TLS used to communicate with your SMTP server.

user.description: User used to communicate with your SMTP server.

block.description: Resource representing the SMTP configuration of an instance.

flow_type.description: Type of the flow to which the action triggers belong, supported values: FLOW_TYPE_EXTERNAL_AUTHENTICATION, FLOW_TYPE_CUSTOMISE_TOKEN, FLOW_TYPE_INTERNAL_AUTHENTICATION, FLOW_TYPE_SAML_RESPONSE

trigger_type.description: Trigger type on when the actions get triggered, supported values: TRIGGER_TYPE_POST_AUTHENTICATION, TRIGGER_TYPE_PRE_CREATION, TRIGGER_TYPE_POST_CREATION, TRIGGER_TYPE_PRE_USERINFO_CREATION, TRIGGER_TYPE_PRE_ACCESS_TOKEN_CREATION, TRIGGER_TYPE_PRE_SAML_RESPONSE_CREATION

block.description: Resource representing triggers, when actions get started
Resource representing the authorization given to a user directly, including the given roles.

key.description: The key of a metadata entry

value.description: The string representation of a metadata entry value. For binary data, use the base64encode function.

block.description: Add a custom attribute to the user like the authenticating system. You can use this information in your actions. This Terraform resource manages a single key-value pair.

allowed_to_fail.description: when true, the next action will be called even if this action fails

timeout.description: after which time the action will be terminated if not finished

block.description: Datasource representing an action belonging to an organization.

client_id.description: generated ID for this config

block.description: Datasource representing an API application belonging to a project, with all configuration possibilities.

name_method.description: Method for querying applications by name, supported values: TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE

block.description: Datasource representing multiple API applications belonging to a project.

client_id.description: Client ID

skip_native_app_success_page.description: Skip the successful login page on native apps and directly redirect the user to the callback.

block.description: Datasource representing an OIDC application belonging to a project, with all configuration possibilities.

name_method.description: Method for querying applications by name, supported values: TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE

block.description: Datasource representing multiple OIDC applications belonging to a project.
Datasource representing a SAML application belonging to a project, with all configuration possibilities.

name_method.description: Method for querying applications by name, supported values: TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE

block.description: Datasource representing multiple SAML applications belonging to a project.

refresh_token_idle_expiration.description: expiration duration of idle refresh tokens

block.description: Datasource representing the default oidc settings.

is_email_verified.description: Is the email verified of the user, can only be true if password of the user is set

is_phone_verified.description: Is the phone verified of the user

client_secret.description: client secret generated by the identity provider

is_auto_creation.description: enabled if a new account in ZITADEL are created automatically on login with an external account

is_auto_update.description: enabled if a the ZITADEL account fields are updated automatically on each login

is_creation_allowed.description: enabled if users are able to create a new account in ZITADEL when using an external account

is_id_token_mapping.description: if true, provider information get mapped from the id token, not from the userinfo endpoint.

is_linking_allowed.description: enabled if users are able to link an existing ZITADEL user with an external account

scopes.description: the scopes requested by ZITADEL during the request on the identity provider

block.description: Datasource representing a generic OIDC IdP on the organization.

domain_method.description: Method for querying orgs by domain, supported values: TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE

ids.description: A set of all organization IDs.

name_method.description: Method for querying orgs by name, supported values: TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE

state.description: State of the org, supported values: ORG_STATE_UNSPECIFIED, ORG_STATE_ACTIVE, ORG_STATE_INACTIVE, ORG_STATE_REMOVED

block.description: Datasource representing an organization in ZITADEL, which is the highest level after the instance and contains several other resource including policies if the configuration differs to the default policies on the instance.

has_project_check.description: ZITADEL checks if the org of the user has permission to this project

private_labeling_setting.description: Defines from where the private labeling should be triggered

project_role_assertion.description: describes if roles of user should be added in token

project_role_check.description: ZITADEL checks if the user has at least one on this project

block.description: Datasource representing the project, which can then be granted to different organizations or users directly, containing different applications.
Datasource representing the project roles, which can be given as authorizations to users.

name_method.description: Method for querying projects by name, supported values: TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_EQUALS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_STARTS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_CONTAINS_IGNORE_CASE, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH, TEXT_QUERY_METHOD_ENDS_WITH_IGNORE_CASE

project_ids.description: A set of all project IDs.

block.description: Datasource representing the project, which can then be granted to different organizations or users directly, containing different applications.

flow_type.description: Type of the flow to which the action triggers belong

trigger_type.description: Trigger type on when the actions get triggered

block.description: Resource representing triggers, when actions get started
